attributes.action: Stop official government enclosures containing commercial advertising
attributes.additional_details:
Today I received a form from the DVLA as an application to continue my driving license.In the sealed brown government envelope there was a flyer.
This flyer turned out to be a non official advertising document that proceeded to mislead me into charging for what should be a free service.
The DVLA are aware that these flyers are enclosed in official enclosures however it would seem that they are unable to explain this.
I call upon the government to put a stop to this intrusion in any official documents by commercial enterprise.
